EmailTemplate.description: Template to inform partners conveying that their access was revoked.
EmailTemplate.name: 3B. Partner Community Full Access Revoked - Custom
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive to provide subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Adaptive to provide email content when declining a partner prospect's registration.
If need any assistance, please connect with us at partners@adaptiveinsights.com
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
